metadata.title: CVE-2018-12438 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Elliptic Curve Cryptography library (aka sunec or libsunec) allows amemory-cache side-channel attack on ECDSA signatures, aka the Return Of theHidden Number Problem or ROHNP. To discover an ECDSA key, the attackerneeds access to either the local machine or a different virtual machine onthe same physical host.

criterions.comment: openjdk-7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
